resources.string:
External Media Unavailable

The SD Card is a required part of i-jetty, and needs to be present, formatted, mounted, not read-only, and with sufficient space to hold the temporary files that i-jetty needs.

Please correct your SD-Card state.
MEDIA_REMOVED\n\nPlease replace the SD Card and try again.

MEDIA_UNMOUNTED

Media is present, but not mounted.
See your System Settings > SD Card screen for mounting instructions.

MEDIA_CHECKING

Media is present, but is being disk-checked by the OS.
Please wait a few minutes for this process to finish and try again.
MEDIA_NOFS\n\nMedia is present, but is blank or is using a filesystem type that is unsupported by the Android OS.

MEDIA_MOUNTED_READ_ONLY

Media is present, and mounted, but is read-only.
Jetty requires a filesystem that it can write to.

Please correct and try again.

MEDIA_SHARED

Media is present, but is unavailable to Jetty as it is currently involved in USB mass storage file sharing with a desktop.
Complete your USB mass storage sharing and try again.

MEDIA_BAD_REMOVAL

Media is not present, and the Android OS reports that it was removed unsafely.
Please replace media, let Android check it, and try again.

MEDIA_UNMOUNTABLE

Media is present, but the Android OS cannot mount it.
This typically happens if the filesystem or media is bad or corrupted.
Replace media and try again.

UNHANDLED ERROR

Media state cannot be determined.
State being reported by Android is %s
pls grant storage and file manage permission
